vulnerabilities.check_name: Enable detailed monitoring for EC2 instances
vulnerabilities.description: EC2 instances should have detailed monitoring enabled

vulnerabilities.check_name: Ensure Instance Metadata Service Version 2 is enforced
vulnerabilities.description: IMDSv2 should be enforced for EC2 instances

vulnerabilities.check_name: Minimize admission of containers with allowPrivilegeEscalation
vulnerabilities.description: Containers should not allow privilege escalation

vulnerabilities.check_name: Minimize admission of containers with privileged flag
vulnerabilities.description: Containers should not run in privileged mode

vulnerabilities.check_name: Containers should not run as root user
vulnerabilities.description: Containers should run as non-root user
